original_text: When Phinehas the priest and the leaders of the community—the heads of the clans of the Israelites—heard what Reuben, Gad and Manasseh had to say, they were pleased.
korean_text: 제사장 비느하스와 그와 함께 한 회중의 지도자들 곧 이스라엘 천천의 수령들이 르우벤 자손과 갓 자손과 므낫세 자손의 말을 듣고 좋게 여긴지라

sentences.original_text: and the leaders of the community
the heads of the clans of the Israelites
heard what Reuben, Gad and Manasseh had to say
sentences.korean_translation: 르우벤, 갓 그리고 므낫세가 말한 것을 들었을 때
